es un descarte
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Mart=EDn Massera 
  =
To: JuegosAR@... 
  Sent: Monday, November 21, 2005 12:06 AM=

  Subject: Re: [JuegosAr] OT: Descartes


  Pero tal vez el chiste 2 si es=
 gracioso imaginate esto:

    2)
    Descartes goes into a restaurant and =
orders a cup of coffee. He sits for a while, drinking his coffee and readin=
g the paper. 
    A little while later, the waitress comes by and asks him =
if he would like another cup. He says "I think not" y entra un gallego al r=
estaurant con un loro, entonces la moza le pregunta: =BFHabla el animal? Y =
el loro responde: =BFY yo qu=E9 s=E9? 

    ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
   From: H. Hernan Moraldo 
    To: JuegosAR@... 
    Sent: =
Saturday, November 19, 2005 10:07 PM
    Subject: Re: [JuegosAr] OT: Descar=
tes


    Hmmm... adem=E1s, "pienso luego existo" no debe necesariamente im=
plicar "no pienso luego no existo" para que el chiste funcione.

    "piens=
o luego existo" implica que en caso de suceder "no pienso", puede suceder t=
anto "no existo" como "existo". Digamos que la situaci=F3n hasta el punto d=
e "I think not" genera dos chistes diferentes posibles:


      1)
      De=
scartes goes into a restaurant and orders a cup of coffee. He sits for a wh=
ile, drinking his coffee and reading the paper. 
      A little while later=
, the waitress comes by and asks him if he would like another cup. He says =
"I think not" and disappears. 


      2)
      Descartes goes into a resta=
urant and orders a cup of coffee. He sits for a while, drinking his coffee =
and reading the paper. 
      A little while later, the waitress comes by a=
nd asks him if he would like another cup. He says "I think not" and doesn't=
 disappear. 

    S=F3lo el primer chiste es gracioso, por qu=E9 nos molest=
ar=EDamos en contar el otro? As=ED como al jugar un juego, no percibimos to=
das las sesiones de juego posibles en simult=E1neo, sino s=F3lo una, en el =
caso de este chiste tampoco tenemos un recuento de todos los finales posibl=
es, sino que s=F3lo de uno.






    El s=E1b, 19-11-2005 a las 12:33, H. =
Hernan Moraldo escribi=F3: 
> ojotaaaaaaaa
> "pienso luego existo" no impli=
ca "no pienso luego no existo"

Epa... no lo pens=E9 cuando le=ED el chiste=
. Es buena...

Entonces tendr=EDa que ser: "He disappears, and he says 'I t=
hink not'"

Pero entonces ya no tendr=EDa sentido :)
